actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-1110.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing a procedure to concur in the Senate Amendment to H. J. Res. 521, a joint resolution making additional funds available by transfer for the fiscal year ending Sept. 30, 1980, for the Selective Service System.

summary.text: Provides for a procedure to concur in the Senate amendment to H.J.Res. 521 (Selective Service System funding).

titles.title: A resolution providing a procedure to concur in the Senate Amendment to H. J. Res. 521, a joint resolution making additional funds available by transfer for the fiscal year ending Sept. 30, 1980, for the Selective Service System.
